channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- encoding/gob
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- encoding/gob

item.title: CVE-2024-34156|2024-09-09T14:29:46.867Z -- go%20standard%20library -- encoding%2Fgob
item.description: Calling Decoder.Decode on a message which contains deeply nested structures can cause a panic due to stack exhaustion. This is a follow-up to CVE-2022-30635.

item.description: Calling Decoder.Decode on a message which contains deeply nested structures can cause a panic due to stack exhaustion. This is a follow-up to CVE-2022-30635.
